H0.text: How many hearts does an earthworm have. 1

H1.text: How many hearts does an earthworm have. 3

H2.text: How many hearts does an earthworm have. 7

H3.text: How many hearts does an earthworm have. 5

A4.text: In many earthworms, some of the vessels that connect the upper and lower main vessels function as hearts.

A5.text: There are five small muscular vessels that contract and act as hearts in earthworms.

A6.text: There are five muscular vessels functioning as hearts, not just one, in earthworms.
